list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add Prettier configuration to project settings
Introduce a `.idea/prettier.xml` file to enable automatic Prettier configuration. This ensures consistent code formatting across the project when using compatible IDEs.

task.summary:
Add initial project setup with TypeScript, ESLint, and Prettier
Introduced a YouTrack MCP server implementation using TypeScript. Configured ESLint and Prettier for code linting and formatting. Added essential project dependencies and scripts in the package.json file.
